name: unilateralist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who believes in acting independently, without involving another group or country: They are both, in different ways, outspoken unilateralists. See
unilateral
a person who believes in getting rid of your country's nuclear weapons without first waiting for other countries to do the same: He is a left-winger and apparently still a committed unilateralist.
More examplesFewer examplesWe're accused of not consulting, of being unilateralists.He's a unilateralist; he thinks he knows all the answers. Unilateralists don't ask opinions of world leaders. the recent defeat of the unilateralists on nuclear disarmament

unilateral
More examplesFewer examplesThe foreign policy became outspokenly unilateralist.The US was more unilateralist in its approach than Europe.We are working closely with our allies so we are not perceived as unilateralist cowboys.
